mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoJobRequstAtchmnfl Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ REQUST_SN , REQUST_ATCHMNFL_TURN , REQUST_ATCH_FILE_NM , REQUST_ATCH_FILE_URL , REQUST_ATCH_FILE_CPCTY , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_JOB_REQUST_ATCHMNFL WHERE 1 = 1 AND REQUST_SN = #{requstSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND REQUST_ATCHMNFL_TURN = #{requstAtchmnflTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
